--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Northlight" <domnijoeproductions2001@y...> wrote:
> ::REDHOT::
> 
>     The seeker closed his eyes, absorbed in Firedrill's tale, 
vividly 
> imagining the story as the Autobot told it. The story was 
> FANTASTIC..... He had several questions he wanted to ask, but he 
> didn't want to interrupt.
> 

    ::REDHOT::

    Redhot quietly rubbed his cockpit. 
    "The Autobot Ironhide was around for your creation?" he politely 
interrupted. "I certainly feels like ages since I last saw him. Mind 
you it was in battle. I wonder if he's still around."


> Northlight
> Domnijoe Productions
